channel.title: I can't bann in my server
channel.description: Whenever i ban someone they keep coming back... HOW?!

item.title: I can't bann in my server

item.description:
@mackel wrote:

ok done… thanks, but now i get this : client.java:3560: illegal start of expression
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
^

1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Wtf does that mean?

item.source: I can't bann in my server

item.title: I can't bann in my server
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

then use this code, i have it in mine and it works perfect:

if(command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 2 )
                        {
                        String victim = command.substring(8);
			PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
                        System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
                        sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned");
			appendToBanned(victim);
      BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	 bw.write(playerName+" banned "+victim);
	 bw.newLine();
	 bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	 ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	 if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
	 }
      }

Read full topic

item.title: I can't bann in my server
item.dc:creator: @mackel mackel
item.description:
@mackel wrote:

:P[quote=“pimpylt, post:9, topic:172059”]hmm go to ur client.java … go to edit, search for banuser if u dont got add this

}
if(command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 2)
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
victim = victim.replace(" ", "_");
appendToBanned(victim);
LogBan(victim);
}[/quote]

THANK YOU! but where do i insert that? lol

item.title: I can't bann in my server
item.dc:creator: @pimpylt pimpylt
item.description:
@pimpylt wrote:

hmm go to ur client.java … go to edit, search for banuser if u dont got add this

}
if(command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 2)
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
victim = victim.replace(" ", "_");
appendToBanned(victim);
LogBan(victim);
}

item.title: I can't bann in my server
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

how hard is it? open client.java, hit ctrl-f, type banuser, hit enter, if there are no results you don’t have the command, if it shows a result, look at the code and see if it looks like it will work.

Not towards you, but almost every person on this site, I just realized how annoying that is, I mean all it takes is common sense, open up all your java files in notepad++ and look through em, almost everything there is self explanatory.

Read full topic

&& NameEqualsIgnoreCase(blah)) }
